caddy                                  = service.testdomain.tailnet.gnx
tailnet.route                            = /path/*
tailnet.route.0_uri                      = strip_prefix /path
tailnet.route.1_reverse_proxy            = {{upstreams}}
tailnet.route.1_reverse_proxy.health_uri = /health
----------
service.testdomain.tailnet.gnx {
	route /path/* {
		uri strip_prefix /path
		reverse_proxy target {
			health_uri /health
		}
	}
}
